doc.title: Freier Fall
doc.plot: One year after having graduated, young Sarah returns to her home town. She was invited to the funeral of a former schoolmate who, tragically, died during military service. Together with her best friend Lisa, Sarah remembers the last shared experiences, before everyone of them follow their own path in life. Her homecoming becomes a time travel", which confronts both of the young women with the adventurous events and repressed feelings of their past.
